db:article.db:para: FreeType is a freely available software library to render fonts.
Optionally used in Qt GUI and platform plugins. Configure with -no-freetype, or -system-freetype to avoid.
The sources can be found in qtbase/src/3rdparty/freetype/src/bdf.
